title: Wijeyadasa requests speaker to form an interim govt.
body_lines: Parliamentarian Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe today requested Speaker Mahinda Yapa Abeywardana to form an interim government to solve the current issues in the country.
He requested the speaker to take responsibility in this situation to form an interim government.
If we do not form the interim government to solve the present issues, the whole country would curse us all.

For the sake of solving the current crisis, Rajapakshe appealed to all parliamentarians not to focus on their personal agendas and political gains and to come forward to give priority to solve the burning issues the country is faced with. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
